subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nikki Teasley scored a career-high 26 points and made 6 of 10 3-point shots to lead the Washington Mystics to an 88-70 victory over the visiting Liberty. Shameka Christon led the Liberty (2-9) with 16 points.
snippet: Nikki Teasley scored a career-high 26 points and made 6 of 10 3-point shots to lead the Washington Mystics to an 88-70 victory over the visiting Liberty. Shameka Christon led the Liberty (2-9) with 16 points.
